医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
B 细胞中 Gα13 的缺失与膳食谷氨酰胺导致淋巴瘤风险增加有关研究人员发现，B 细胞中 Gα13 的缺失会增强肠道相关淋巴结的增殖，从而增加患淋巴瘤的风险。膳食中的谷氨酰胺显着促进这些作用，凸显了饮食与癌症之间的重要联系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240729/Loss-of-Gceb113-in-B-cells-linked-to-increased-lymphoma-risk-due-to-dietary-glutamine.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240729/Loss-of-Gceb113-in-B-cells-linked-to-increased-lymphoma-risk-due-to-dietary-glutamine.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=977bc792-7bda-4daa-8d16-e7b714ecc3ee Mon, 29 Jul 2024 18:15:00 -0400 Loss of Gα13 in B-cells linked to increased lymphoma risk due to dietary glutamine
索马鲁肽可降低糖尿病患者的吸烟风险索马鲁肽有望减少 2 型糖尿病患者与烟草使用障碍相关的健康问题，但需要进一步的临床试验来证实其功效。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240729/Semaglutide-may-reduce-smoking-risks-for-diabetes-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240729/Semaglutide-may-reduce-smoking-risks-for-diabetes-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c21261e6-490d-4436-bedf-86479fb6e376 Mon, 29 Jul 2024 17:01:00 -0400 Semaglutide may reduce smoking risks for diabetes patients
先进的 3D 模型复制毛囊环境以更好地评估药物治疗毛囊是围绕发根的复杂结构，将其固定在皮肤上并固定头发。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240729/Advanced-3D-model-replicates-hair-follicle-environment-to-better-evaluate-drug-treatments.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240729/Advanced-3D-model-replicates-hair-follicle-environment-to-better-evaluate-drug-treatments.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1232f9df-3fbe-4cc1-b3ef-8a8786757ddf Mon, 29 Jul 2024 14:51:43 -0400 Advanced 3D model replicates hair follicle environment to better evaluate drug treatments
杜克大学-新加坡国立大学科学家获​​得大量资金用于开发慢性炎症疗法杜克大学-新加坡国立大学医学院的副教授 Lena Ho 获得了 185 万美元（约合 251 万新元）的资助，以进一步推进其团队的研究，将微生物蛋白开发为治疗慢性炎症的治疗靶点。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240729/Duke-NUS-scientist-awarded-major-funding-to-develop-therapeutics-for-chronic-inflammation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240729/Duke-NUS-scientist-awarded-major-funding-to-develop-therapeutics-for-chronic-inflammation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0bea17ee-3813-4e00-a036-3249e97dee31 Mon, 29 Jul 2024 14:45:44 -0400 Duke-NUS scientist awarded major funding to develop therapeutics for chronic inflammation
卫生当局警告生奶和未煮熟的食物存在禽流感风险由于牛奶中检测到禽流感病毒，美国卫生当局警告公众注意潜在的接触源，包括饮用生牛奶或未经高温消毒的牛奶，并重申一般性警告，食用未煮熟或未煮熟的家禽或牛肉产品可能会使您生病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240729/Health-authorities-warn-about-bird-flu-risks-in-raw-milk-and-undercooked-foods.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240729/Health-authorities-warn-about-bird-flu-risks-in-raw-milk-and-undercooked-foods.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=10af4b4a-3844-4fe4-8f24-3fe4dcf3ad2f Mon, 29 Jul 2024 14:41:08 -0400 Health authorities warn about bird flu risks in raw milk and undercooked foods
通过线粒体 DNA 靶向推进肝细胞癌治疗肝细胞癌 (HCC) 是全球第五大最常见的恶性肿瘤，也是癌症相关死亡的第四大原因，它带来了重大的治疗挑战。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240729/Advancing-hepatic-cell-carcinoma-treatment-through-mitochondrial-DNA-targeting.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240729/Advancing-hepatic-cell-carcinoma-treatment-through-mitochondrial-DNA-targeting.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a30f95c3-95c3-491a-bc87-fdf470f639a3 Mon, 29 Jul 2024 14:25:32 -0400 Advancing hepatic cell carcinoma treatment through mitochondrial DNA targeting
石棉暴露和致癌性：全面审查石棉是一组天然存在的纤维矿物，历史上因其耐用性和耐热性而被使用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240729/Asbestos-exposure-and-carcinogenicity-A-compressive-review.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240729/Asbestos-exposure-and-carcinogenicity-A-compressive-review.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ca58a97a-ddba-4a6a-9a38-633781f4324f Mon, 29 Jul 2024 14:19:00 -0400 Asbestos exposure and carcinogenicity: A comprehensive review
仅靠日常体力活动不足以预防中风哥德堡大学进行的研究表明，我们在生活中、工作中或家里进行的体育活动不足以保护我们免于中风。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240729/Everyday-physical-activity-alone-not-enough-to-prevent-中风.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240729/Everyday-physical-activity-alone-not-enough-to-prevent-中风.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1a9a173a-b10b-4e5b-9c21-9d364d3b7fca Mon, 29 Jul 2024 14:01:32 -0400 Everyday physical activity alone not enough to prevent stroke
早期课堂健康教育预防儿童腹部脂肪堆积由国家心血管研究中心 (CNIC) 和 Fundación SHE 领导并得到“la Caixa”基金会支持的一项研究表明，通过课堂活动教授健康习惯有助于防止学年第一年腹部脂肪的堆积。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240729/Early-classroom-based-health-education-prevents-abdominal-fat-accumulation-in-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240729/Early-classroom-based-health-education-prevents-abdominal-fat-accumulation-in-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f05aaf6e-c78a-49ed-b0e8-a2e19d81fb78 Mon, 29 Jul 2024 13:56:36 -0400 Early classroom-based health education prevents abdominal fat accumulation in children
了解 β 地中海贫血的铁超负荷：机制、诊断和治疗β-地中海贫血是一种遗传性疾病，其特征是血红蛋白β链合成减少或缺失，导致红细胞生成无效和严重贫血。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240729/Understanding-iron-overload-in-ceb2-thalassemia-Mechanisms-diagnosis-and-treatments.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240729/Understanding-iron-overload-in-ceb2-thalassemia-Mechanisms-diagnosis-and-treatments.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9b4b65d9-e283-47e9-a336-ed48551ed722 Mon, 29 Jul 2024 13:15:01 -0400 Understanding iron overload in β-thalassemia: Mechanisms, diagnosis, and treatments
